description:
Tucked in south of Prospect Park around the corner from the express B & Q trains, many delicious restaurants, local coffeeshops, and a farmer's market! You’ll love our place because of the cozy and spacious atmosphere, the bright and sunny bedroom and a full kitchen! Great for couples with kids, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Quick trips or long stays are welcome!

I have been living here for many years and have had many lovely roommates. I hope you'll also enjoy the space as much as I do. It is close to Manhattan and have many farm to table restaurants a stone's throw away.

The apartment is yours for your stay. Mi casa es su casa!

I'm a text or phone call away. I work in Manhattan. Happy to help you find some exciting places to go and fun things to do.

The apartment is one block from the Church Avenue (B,Q) and the Beverly Road (Q) Stations. Get around Brooklyn easily with uber or buses. Street parking is available.
name: Spacious & Cozy BK - 20 min from Manhattan!
review: Séjour très agréable. Chelsea est une hôtesse formidable. Elle répond immédiatement à nos demandes. L'appartement est agréable et propre. Super bien situé. Proche des commerces et du métro. Sans hésitation nous y retournerions.
